channel.title: How to get Adobe Photoshop CS3 beta LEGALLY!
channel.description: I know many of you already found that renaming the application.sif file tricks the program into thinking it is registered. However for any of you who want to legally obtain a version of photoshop CS3 beta this is how you would do it. 1)Download Adobe Photoshop CS 3 beta from: http://labs.adobe.com/technologies/photoshopcs3/ 2)Get your CS 3 beta serial by typing in your CS 2 serial here: https://www.adobe.com/cfusion/entitlement/index.cfm?e=labs%5Fphotoshop%5Fsn 3)start the installer file and select which files to install: [img]http://farm1.static.flickr.com/133/323158533_0499bb61a0_o.png[/img] 4)After installation, run photoshop where it prompts you to either type in your serial number where you obtained in step 2 or try photoshop for 30 days. [img]http://www.imagemule.com/uploads/serial3y7TH.png[/img] 5)Installation is complete! [img]http://www.imagemule.com/uploads/serial2Vras.png[/img] 6)This is how the program looks like [img]http://www.imagemule.com/uploads/photoshop-cs3UVlz.png[/img] I hope you enjoyed my tutorial!

item.title: How to get Adobe Photoshop CS3 beta LEGALLY!
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Legally? The only way to get it leagally is to buy it.

Believe it or not this is a legal version because I did buy a genuine version of adobe photoshop. The website is just to convert the CS2 serial into a CS3 one as it follows a different algorithm. The program is also registered after activation so yes it is indeed legit.

Read full topic

@xxhellfirexx wrote:

I know many of you already found that renaming the application.sif file tricks the program into thinking it is registered. However for any of you who want to legally obtain a version of photoshop CS3 beta this is how you would do it.
1)Download Adobe Photoshop CS 3 beta from:
http://labs.adobe.com/technologies/photoshopcs3/
2)Get your CS 3 beta serial by typing in your CS 2 serial here:

Adobe: Creative, marketing and document management solutions

Adobe: Creative, marketing and document management solutions

Adobe is changing the world through digital experiences. We help our customers create, deliver and optimize content and applications.


3)start the installer file and select which files to install:

4)After installation, run photoshop where it prompts you to either type in your serial number where you obtained in step 2 or try photoshop for 30 days.

5)Installation is complete!
